name: save_restore_cursor_in_region
description: DECSC/DECRC preserves cursor position across moves within an active scroll region
comment: Print 'A' at (0,0). DECSTBM(2,4) → cursor homes to (0,0). CUP(3,4) → (2,3). DECSC saves cursor. CUP(4,1) → (3,0). Print 'X'. DECRC restores to (2,3). Print 'Y'.
